DescribeImageAnimateJob.document: This API is used to query image animation tasks. The image animation feature supports generating videos based on dance movements and images to meet the needs of scenarios such as social entertainment and interactive marketing.
DescribeImageAnimateJob.name: Querying image animation task

SubmitImageAnimateJob.document: This API is used to submit image animation tasks. The image animation feature supports generating videos based on dance movements and images to meet the needs of scenarios such as social entertainment and interactive marketing.
SubmitImageAnimateJob.name: Submitting image animation task

members.document: Task ID.
members.name: JobId

members.document: Task status. WAIT: waiting; RUN: running; FAIL: failed; DONE: successful.
members.name: Status

members.document: Error code.
members.name: ErrorCode

members.document: Error message.
members.name: ErrorMessage

members.document: Generated video URL. It is valid for 24 hours.
members.name: ResultVideoUrl

members.document: Masked video URL.
members.name: MaskVideoUrl

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document:
Watermark URL

Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: LogoUrl

members.document:
Watermark Base64 code is supported. Either the Base64 code or URL must be provided. If both are provided, the URL prevails.

Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: LogoImage

members.document:
The coordinates of the watermark image in the generated image. The mark image will be expanded according to the coordinates.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: LogoRect

members.document:
X-axis coordinate of the upper left corner

Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: X

members.document:
Y-axis coordinate of the upper left corner

Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Y

members.document:
Box width

Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Width

members.document:
Box height

Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Height

members.document:
Image format: PNG, JPG, and JPEG formats are supported.
Image resolution: The long edge resolution should not exceed 2056.
Image size: The size should not exceed 10 MB.
Image aspect ratio: The ratio of width to height should be in the range of 1:2 to 1:1.2.
members.name: ImageUrl

members.document: Image information after Base64 encoding. Image format: PNG, JPG, and JPEG formats are supported. Image resolution: The long side resolution should not exceed 2056. Image size: The size should not exceed 10 MB. Image aspect ratio: The ratio of width to height should be in the range of 1:2 to 1:1.2.
members.name: ImageBase64

members.document: Action template ID. ke3: kemusan; tuziwu: rabbit dance; huajiangwu: paddling dance.
members.name: TemplateId

members.document: Whether the generated video retains the audio in the template. The default value is true.
members.name: EnableAudio

members.document: Whether to detect 12 body parts in the input image (head, neck, right shoulder, right elbow, right wrist, left shoulder, left elbow, left wrist, right hip, left hip, left knee, and right knee). They are not detected by default.
members.name: EnableBodyJoins

members.document: Whether the final video retains the background of the original image. (This parameter does not take effect when TemplateId is set to tuziwu or huajiangwu.)
members.name: EnableSegment

members.document:
Whether to add a mark to the generated video. The default value is 0.
1: A mark is added.
0: No mark is added.
Other values: A mark is added by default.
It is recommended to use an obvious mark to indicate that the video is synthesized by AI.
members.name: LogoAdd

members.document:
Mark text settings.
By default, the text "Synthesized by AI" is added to the bottom right corner of the generated video. You can also use other text images.
members.name: LogoParam

members.document: Task ID.
members.name: JobId

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId
